programme.title: SPM Prinsip Perakaunan Ep03
programme.desc: Nina berkongsi tip dan strategi menjawab soalan dengan Zach mengenai akaun kawalan penghutang dan pemiutang.

programme.title: SPM Prinsip Perakaunan Ep04
programme.desc: Nina berkongsi tip dan strategi menjawab soalan dengan Zach mengenai penyediaan penyata pendapatan.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Cina Ep03
programme.desc: Focuses on Phrase with questions and explanation and a full composition example of Expressive Composition and explanation.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Cina Ep04
programme.desc: Focuses on how to summarize an essay with tips and guidance and how to write a proper format of a Notice.

programme.title: SPM Ekonomi Asas Ep03
programme.desc: Pelajari tentang Permintaan serta hukum permintaan bersama Zach dan Nina. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan esei, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Ekonomi Asas Ep04
programme.desc: Pelajari tentang topik Penawaran bersama Zach dan Nina. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan esei, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Geografi Ep03
programme.desc: Dapatkan tip-tip dan teknik menjawab bagi pelbagai soalan mengenai kepentingan hutan serta usaha pemeliharaan dan pemuliharaan hutan.

programme.title: SPM Geografi Ep04
programme.desc: Dapatkan tip-tip dan teknik menjawab bagi pelbagai soalan mengenai kepentingan hidupan liar serta usaha pemeliharaan dan pemuliharaan hidupan liar daripada kepupusan.

programme.title: SPM Sejarah Ep01
programme.desc: Kertas 1 - Ulang kaji tentang Kemunculan Tamadun Awal Manusia. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan objektif, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Sejarah Ep02
programme.desc: Kertas 2 - Ulang kaji tentang Kemunculan Tamadun Awal Manusia. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan struktur, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Sejarah Ep01
programme.desc: Cikgu Kamal memperkenalkan topik Sistem Ahli kepada anda, dan berkongsi bagaimana untuk menjawab soalan-soalan yang berkaitan. Saksikanlah Top Tutor anda ini dengan gayanya yang tersendiri.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Sejarah Ep02
programme.desc: Kerajaan Islam di Madinah merupakan topik pilihan dalam episod ini. Cikgu Kamal berkongsi formula-formula khasnya untuk mengingati fakta-fakta penting dan menjawab pelbagai soalan.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Bahasa Melayu Ep01
programme.desc: Menghadapi masalah untuk menulis rumusan yang mantap? Jangan khuatir - ikuti tunjuk ajar Cikgu Siti, Top Tutor Bahasa Malaysia anda. Dalam episod ini, Cikgu Siti menerangkan cara untuk menulis rumusan.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Bahasa Melayu Ep02
programme.desc: Cikgu Siti mengupas jenis-jenis peribahasa yang anda perlu tahu untuk menunjukkan Pengetahuan dan Kemahiran Bahasa anda. Saksikan episod ini untuk mengetahui teknik yang betul untuk menjawab soalan.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Geografi Ep01
programme.desc: Gerakan Jisim merupakan topik yang amat popular dalam peperiksaan Geografi SPM. Ingin skor markah yang tinggi - saksikan episod ini bersama Cikgu Rajan dan ketahui rahsia menjawab soalan dengan tepat.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Geografi Ep02
programme.desc: Tindakan air mengalir meninggalkan pelbagai kesan di atas muka bumi kita ini. Cikgu Rajan menghuraikan setiap fenomena alam ini, dan menjawab soalan berdasarkan topik ini.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Prinsip Perakaunan Ep01
programme.desc: Cikgu Rosel menerangkan cara-cara untuk menjawab soalan berdasarkan Belanjawan Tunai dalam episod ini. Jangan ketinggalan jika ingin berjaya dalam peperiksaan SPM!

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Prinsip Perakaunan Ep02
programme.desc: Akaun Kawalan merupakan topik hangat yang dibincangkan oleh Cikgu Rosel dalam episod ini. Ikuti langkah-langkah menjawab soalan untuk mencapai keputusan yang cemerlang.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep01
programme.desc: Perimeters and Areas of Circles - Students are shown how to calculate the perimeter and area of a sector and also taken through clone questions in order to work out the answer.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep02
programme.desc: Circle and Angle Properties - Students are shown how to use these properties or laws to find the value of the missing angle.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Add Maths Ep01
programme.desc: Indices and Logarithms - Tutor explains the laws of indices and notations, then shows how to use these laws to solve an unknown (x or y) using the comparison rule.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Add Maths Ep02
programme.desc: Simultaneous Equation - In this episode, students are shown how to solve liner and non- linear equations using the substitution method.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep07
programme.desc: Paper 1: Section A about Directed Writing (Formal Letter). Focuses on format based on task word, how to plan the essay, how to expand the notes given and tips on style of language for a formal letter.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep08
programme.desc: Paper 2: Section C: Summary Writing. Includes check list and techniques for Summary Writing, identifying points and what not to include in a summary.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Melayu Ep25
programme.desc: Kertas 1 memfokus Karangan Umum (Rencana). Ikuti latihan dan tip tip dalam menghasilkan rencana yang tepat.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Melayu Ep26
programme.desc: Kertas 2 memfokus Peribahasa. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan dan huraian jawapan serta penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Bahasa Melayu Ep03
programme.desc: Novel Konserto Terakhir merupakan salah satu karya menarik Abdullah Hussain. Ikuti Cikgu Siti dalam mengupas semua aspek dan soalan penting berkaitan dengan novel ini.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Bahasa Melayu Ep04
programme.desc: Ikuti episod ini untuk mengetahui langkah-langkah dalam menulis karangan umum yang cemerlang, dengan nasihat daripada Top Tutor anda - Cikgu Siti.

programme.title: SPM English Ep13
programme.desc: Focuses on Directed Writing in Paper 1, Graphic Stimuli and Short Texts and Information transfer in Paper 2.

programme.title: SPM English Ep15
programme.desc: Focuses on Continuous Writing in Paper 1, Graphic Stimuli and Short Texts and Information transfer in Paper 2. Join Lisa and Danny as they work on how to avoid common errors.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep03
programme.desc: Section B Continuous Writing.Techniques on how to choose and interpret a title for the essay is given. A checklist of do's and don'ts and how to plan an essay are given to help students to score.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep04
programme.desc: Paper 2: Section D - Poem and Novel.Techniques on how to interpret the poem, novel and the question is given matched with a set of sample good answer that will help student to score.

programme.desc: Revise on Mathematical Reasoning. This episode comes complete with SPM model questions, explanations and useful tips.

programme.title: SPM Mod Math Ep04
programme.desc: Revise on Statistics. This episode comes complete with SPM model questions, explanations and useful tips.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep03
programme.desc: Matrices - Explanation of the elements, order and operations of Matrices. Students are shown examples for addition, subtraction and multiplication of Matrices.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep04
programme.desc: Probability II. Explaining the formula to find the Probability of an outcome. How to use the formula is shown by substituting the information given in a question to work out the answer.

programme.desc: Nya, Jay, Cole and Kai face off against the Ice Emperor's dreaded dragon, while Lloyd and his newfound allies, Kataru and Grimfax, confront the Ice Emperor himself...

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Ep132
programme.desc: Robin finally teaches the other Titans a very valuable lesson.

programme.title: We Bare Bears Ep138
programme.desc: The Baby Bears build a giant sandcastle. But when some kids declare war on the Bears, they must fight to defend their new home.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Ep170
programme.desc: Banana Joe's Mom can predict the future, but she can't predict her own disappearance.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep155
programme.desc: /When Donny the Unicorn is hunted by a seemingly unstoppable foe, the Powerpuff Girls have to find a way to save him before it's too late!

programme.title: Running Man Animation Ep11
programme.desc: It's time for the 2nd main game - face the gatekeeper in the tile flipping game! Appearing in the midst of a blinding light, the gatekeeper begins to fire shells at the players.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! Ep253
programme.desc: Bumbleebee becomes the 6th Titan and moves into the Tower but has a hard time adjusting.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep251
programme.desc: Ben completely ignores Gwen when she takes him to a family fun center. Meanwhile, Frightwig pushes Zombozo back into a life of crime after he ends up becoming a party clown.

programme.title: We Bare Bears Ep103
programme.desc: Nom Nom is ordered by his doctor to take a vacation. But he's paired with an unlikely travel buddy- Grizz.

programme.title: Monster Beach Ep121
programme.desc: Dean is abducted by a Captain Kelp with a penchant for boardgames and a hunger for souls. Jan and Amphibia must save him, which means... playing to win.

programme.title: Power Players Ep111
programme.desc: Axel and the team take to the desert dunes of a playground sandbox as Madcap attempts to unearth an army of Spy Lizards from the same line as Galileo!

programme.title: Steven Universe Ep37
programme.desc: Steven thinks he sees something creepy traversing the warp streams and the Gems try to ease his paranoia.

programme.title: Adventure Time Ep63
programme.desc: Finn and Jake hold a contest to see who can last longer without talking.

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: A fresh and exciting comedy from the director of 'Holy Flame of the Martial World' and 'Bastard Swordsman', starring both kung-fu stalwarts and dazzling beauties.

programme.title: Rivals of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Watch as rival kung-fu schools try to sabotage Fei-hung's superior Pao Chih Lin clinic until the chivalrous philanthropist shows them the error of their ways.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: A young rebel goes into legend after being reincarnated to save his people from their tyrannical emperor.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: Directed by Lee Han-hsiang and starring Michael Hui, this blockbuster confirms Hui's versatile talents as the king of comedy.

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: In one of her first roles, 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' villain Cheng Pei Pei plays a kung-fu Nancy Drew who must face a secret serial killer.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: The Shaw Brothers' directors created this 60's classic depicting a timeless romance between a wealthy man and a songbird.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: From veteran director Li Han-hsiang comes this fascinating period drama, starring Li Kun as the ingenious Lord Liu, who is much envied by the Emperor.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Playfulness abounds and innocence is lost in this tale of two naughty females who grow up and discover boys together.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Martial arts maestro Lo Wei wrote, directed and co-starred in this tale of greed and lust for financial gain that depicts a family brought to its knees.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Kung fu idols Wang Yu, Lo Meng and Loh Lieh star in this comedy set in a Shaolin temple where Hung Hsi-kuan and Fang Shih-yu become disciples.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: When evil ninjas brutally slaughter students from a noble Chinese kung-fu academy, the one survivor forms a powerful group to avenge his fallen comrades.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: The Shaw Brothers' most acclaimed film was adapted from huangmei opera by Li han-hsiang, capturing a tale of a Chinese emperor's love for a country maiden.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: Tu Ku, having mastered the Silkworm skills, heads for Wu Tang to challenge Yun but finds him gone. However, the leader of the Ega Clan issues a challenge.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Directed by Chow Sze Loke and Li Han Hsiang, this classic starring Diana Chang, Chang Chung and Pai Yun depicts how Lotus Pan marries a midget, yet has an affair.

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: Director Derek Yee reproduces a 40-year old masterpiece & garners five HKFA award nominations for it. This dazzler stars Lin Geng Xin, Peter Ho & Jiang Yi Yan.

programme.title: Hotel Soul Good
programme.desc: After her boyfriend and job are stolen by her best friend, Mei Qi is hit by a fragment of a meteor, which gives her the ability to see three elderly spirits who need her help to fulfill their last wishes.

programme.title: All You Need is Love
programme.desc: Richie Ren directs & stars in this romance set in Taiwan's Penghu islands, where a wealthy young woman falls for a local hotel owner struggling with problems.

programme.title: The Kid from the Big Apple
programme.desc: This heartwarming box office smash captures how a little Chinese girl, raised in New York, begins to discover her roots when she visits Malaysia.

programme.title: Wu Kong

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Directed by Johnnie To and Wai Ka Fai, this award-winner starring Andy Lau & Cecilia Cheung is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Mr. Unbelievable
programme.desc: In this Singaporean comedy, a middle-aged man begins an unbelievable musical journey by putting English lyrics in classical Chinese songs.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Kara Hui makes her action film swansong by portraying a woman who will stop at nothing to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past resurface. Simon Yam & Wu Bai co-star.

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: Two stories of first loves: A bizarre yet romantic tale of a lonely young man falling in love with a sleepwalker. And a married grocer faces the vengeful first love that he once rejected.

programme.desc: With the help of modern forensic science, new witnesses and criminal psychology, the cops revisit cold cases in order to try to solve them.

programme.desc: On 6th August 2011, 23-year old student Dalene Carlson vanishes during a Saturday night on the town. Security footage from a local bar reveals a number of potential suspects, each with a motive.

programme.desc: From the outside their houses look normal. But inside a family is struggling to keep ahead of the insignificant things that have taken over their lives.

programme.title: Intervention S13 Ep05
programme.desc: Karissa was always a talented cook, so much so that her mother had one day hoped to pass the family diner on to her as a legacy.

programme.title: The Plot Against America
programme.desc: Is America safe? A shift in spending meant the US took its eye off the spy game while Russia continued to dedicate resources. The documentary follows a former FBI Special Agent tracking enemy 'sleepers'.

programme.title: Fatal Vows S5 Ep04
programme.desc: Witness testimony, interviews and dramatic reconstructions reveal how the joys of marriage have given way to spite, greed, back-stabbing and betrayal.

programme.desc: The daughter of FLDS prophet Warren Jeffs reaches out to Jessica and Amanda for their help in rescuing her sister. Ava, a former Kingston clan member, fights to sever ties with her polygamous parents.

programme.desc: When two young men are shot and killed in a car, Gwinnett County Homicide must turn to the survivors to learn the truth about what led to the shooting.

programme.title: Marcia Clark Investigates S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Marcia Clark examines the death of Rebecca Zahau, who was found tied and hanging outside her boyfriend's seaside mansion, and tries to find out whether it was a suicide or a murder.

programme.title: Deadly Wives S1 Ep11

programme.desc: With the Crow-mod almost ready, Chief confronts his PTSD to get back behind the wheel. Shawn faces Monza in his new Camaro, Boosted returns,

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks S1 Ep05
programme.desc: Tommy bowers over the competition in a monster truck with dangerous suspensions.

programme.desc: To beat his rivals out of the deal, lonewolf Ron reluctantly takes on a help to wildly trick out a 96 Camaro.

programme.desc: A 1989 Camaro turns out to be anything but what it seems.

programme.title: World Trade Center
programme.desc: A true story about the rescue mission during the aftermath of the World Trade Center disaster on September 11, 2001.

programme.desc: One family is put to the test during a 12-hour period where crime is made legal and emergency services are suspended.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

programme.desc: Peppa's playgroup holds a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof. Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. They all bring an old toy but soon realise that it is hard to let them go.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are at the pool, so is Rebecca Rabbit. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to find that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep112
programme.desc: We learn about science today as we play Blue's Clues to figure out what experiment Blue wants to try. We look at the world with our magnifying glass, meet the Sun, and learn a song about the planets!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep117
programme.desc: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla's barn.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep118
programme.desc: It's the day of the Dragon Island Duel, a one-on-one race between Blaze and Crusher around the tropical island! Crusher cheats and sends Blaze away before the race, AJ must rescue him and bring him back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep425
programme.desc: Tracker dreams that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! The pups must find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears at his party.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep501
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they look better than the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a pet ostrich but it gets lost on the way home. The PAW Patrol must find it!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Jake and Everest are excited for the Snowboard Competition, until they see the course is buried by snow.

programme.title: Top Wing S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Penny makes a friend, and saves the day, when a stranded polar-bear family floats into the warm water near Big Swirl Island.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep119
programme.desc: ROBO G takes Calvin on a deep sea adventure to find what he needs to finish his underwater artwork. But when a school of jellyfish blocks them, Calvin must summon his PLAY POWER to finish his masterpiece.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Someone (or something) has stolen the snacks for the spooky surprise party! It's up to Calvin and ROBO G to use their PLAY POWER to find them - if the mysterious 'Count Snackula' doesn't find them first.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep112
programme.desc: It's a windy day and Jonathan wishes to play kite with his dad. Since Mr. Brown is stuck at home, Paddington takes Jonathan to the park.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Windy Pete is sailing around the world, blasting tropical climates with snow! Will the Ocean Patrol stop his snowy assault?

programme.title: Butterbean's Caf S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Butterbean wants to make Cricket's birthday wish come true, but everything keeps going wrong!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from school learn to deal with emotions and feelings.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Josh and Blue are painting a portrait of their friends, but it's not quite finished. We play Blue's Clues to figure out who else Blue wants to add to her painting.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep413
programme.desc: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep103

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with the PAW Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta need help! // Farmer Al needs help saving his corn crop after the top of his silo is knocked off!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep117
programme.desc: The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money.
